Uses of Class
net.jodah.failsafe.ExecutionContext

  • Packages that use ExecutionContext 
    Package Description
    net.jodah.failsafe  
    net.jodah.failsafe.event  
    net.jodah.failsafe.function  

    • Uses of ExecutionContext in net.jodah.failsafe

      Subclasses of ExecutionContext in net.jodah.failsafe 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AsyncExecution
      Tracks asynchronous executions and allows retries to be scheduled according to a RetryPolicy.
      class  Execution
      Tracks executions and determines when an execution can be performed for a RetryPolicy.
      Methods in net.jodah.failsafe with parameters of type ExecutionContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Listeners.onComplete(T result, Throwable failure, ExecutionContext context)
      Called when an execution is completed.
      void Listeners.onFailedAttempt(T result, Throwable failure, ExecutionContext context)
      Called after a failed attempt.
      void Listeners.onFailure(T result, Throwable failure, ExecutionContext context)
      Called after the retry policy is exceeded and the result is a failure.
      void Listeners.onRetry(T result, Throwable failure, ExecutionContext context)
      Called before a retry is attempted.
      void Listeners.onSuccess(T result, ExecutionContext context)
      Called after a successful execution.

    • Uses of ExecutionContext in net.jodah.failsafe.event

      Methods in net.jodah.failsafe.event with parameters of type ExecutionContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ContextualResultListener.onResult(R result, F failure, ExecutionContext context)
      Handles an execution result.
      void ContextualSuccessListener.onSuccess(R result, ExecutionContext context)
      Handles the successful completion of a call.
